attributes.action: Cancel plans to rehouse UK immigration applicants in Rwanda.
attributes.additional_details:
The British public have offered rooms and homes for Ukrainian refugees and asylum seekers from other countries. Visa processing times are disgraceful and spending huge sums to temporarily “rehouse” applicants in Rwanda, which has a history of human rights violations is disgraceful. Rescind policy.

Use the funds allocated to Rwanda to house applicants in the UK with people willing to provide homes for those in need. Fix our immigration processing to work faster.
attributes.background: The British public have offered rooms and homes for Ukrainian refugees and asylum seekers from other countries. Visa processing times are disgraceful and spending huge sums to temporarily “rehouse” applicants in Rwanda, which has a history of human rights violations is disgraceful. Rescind policy.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
